subject: Missing pedal plate
description_text:
Dear reader,

ORDER #SSN2116

I’ve just received my pro plus pedals but I’m missing the baseplate I ordered. 

Weirdly enough I don’t see any mention of it in my order confirmation email but going back to the store and add my order to the cart and applying the discount code CART10 like I did on my order I come to the exact price I paid ($276.90 (-$27.69). Pedal setup Plus-P3-H3 (silver) ($219.00), Baseplate * 1($57.90).

Could it be that the baseplate is sent separate and has yet to arrive or might it miss from the package?

Kind regards,
Harm

conversations.body_text: Hi Harm Weverling,  Due to a shortage of silver base plates at our warehouse in Germany, we have shipped the base plates to you from China. They are expected to arrive within the next two days. Here is your tracking number.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/sc/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3191020875793
